Mindful Practices: Integrating SEL into Your Classroom
Conclusion

What's Next?

Check out the following courses to learn more from Mindful Practices.

  • Everday SEL for Adults
    Intuitively, we understand that educators cannot fully teach what they cannot model. That’s one reason educator social-emotional competency is vital to any successful school-wide SEL program. Through mindful practices and self-reflection, you will develop the skills and knowledge required to strengthen your social-emotional competency and create positive, supportive learning environments for yourself and your students. This course is the first in a series on SEL for Adults and is designed to set the foundation for your SEL journey. Learn more
  • Integrating SEL into Your Classroom
    This course offers support and guidance in the Educator’s journey of integrating Social-Emotional Learning (SEL) and mindfulness into the classroom. You will explore structured activities to help your students understand their emotions, improve their focus, manage stress, and regulate their behavior. You will leave with a solid foundation about the "why" behind SEL and gain practical strategies for implementation with your students. Learn more
